definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body

sentences.english: This is a plant of spirit.
he could not be expected to appraise properly the spirit of America.
sentences.chinese: 大家對他能否恰如其分地把握美國精魂不抱什麼期望。

sentences.english: Moonlight Senran, spirit temperament, everything is just a mirage, transient.
sentences.chinese: 月光的森然，樂律的精魂，一切只是幻影，稍縱即逝。

sentences.english: The primal spirits you communicate with are honest but sometimes can be elusive.
sentences.chinese: 你所溝通的原初精魂很誠實，但是有時候難以捉摸。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the spirit is unaffected by the attack.
sentences.chinese: 若傷害沒到該數字，則精魂不受該次攻擊的影響。

sentences.english: Many shaman powers have the spirit keyword.
sentences.chinese: 許多薩滿的威能都有著精魂關鍵字。

definition: soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
three immortal souls in Daoism, representing spirit and intellect
